name: B2k Music
description: Open-Source & Best Music bot to play songs in your Telegram's Group Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

SESSION_NAME.description: Enter the pyrogram string session,do #pyrogramstring in @TeamB2kSupport.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Create a bot from @BotFather and enter it's token below.

API_ID.description: Your Api Id from my.telegram.org or @ApiScrapperBot

API_HASH.description: Your Api Hash from my.telegram.org or @ApiScrapperBot

SUDO_USERS.description: List of user IDs as admin of bot in every group where bot is. (separated by space).

MASTER_USERNAME.description: Enter the username of the owner who created the bot below [WITH @ OR WITHOUT @]

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads minutes [SUGGEST 10-40 MINUTES]
